Title: Series: Grosvenor Gallery
Description: Plate 121: The rest on the flight to Egypt; the Holy Family in a landscape, the Virgin laying the infant Jesus in a cloak to sleep on the ground, having fed him, St Joseph sleeping with his head on his arms against a ruined wall; after Adriaen van der Werff; illustration cut from John Young's 'A Catalogue of Pictures at Grosvenor House'. 1820 Etching
Curator's comments: From Grosvenor gallery, see 2006,U.456. After the 1706 painting in the National Gallery, London; see Barbara Gaehtgens, 'Adriaen van der Werff 1659-1722', Munich, 1987, cat.no.69.
Associated names: Associated with: Richard Grosvenor, 1st Earl Grosvenor
Associated titles: A Catalogue of Pictures at Grosvenor House
